L

lang - Variable in class langReco.reco.LanguageRecognizer
List of languages present in the train corpus + unk for a potential unknown language
langModel - package langModel
 
langNgramCountMap - Variable in class langReco.reco.LanguageRecognizer
Map of ngram counter file paths associated with each language as each language can be associated with several language models.
langReco.eval - package langReco.eval
 
langReco.reco - package langReco.reco
 
langReco.train - package langReco.train
 
LanguageModelsEstimatorTest - Class in langReco.train
 
LanguageModelsEstimatorTest() - Constructor for class langReco.train.LanguageModelsEstimatorTest
 
LanguageRecognizer - Class in langReco.reco
Abstract class LanguageRecognizer: abstract class that every language recognition system has to implement.
LanguageRecognizer() - Constructor for class langReco.reco.LanguageRecognizer
Constructor.
loadNgramCountPath4Lang(String) - Method in class langReco.reco.LanguageRecognizer
Method parsing a configuration file where each line is a tuple in the following format: lang ngramCountName ngramCountFilePath (each value is separated by a whitespace character; lines started with # are not considered) This method initialized the langNgramCountMap attribute with the language models used in the recognition system.
